entries.message: Our datacenter partner is continuing to work on restoring power to the site. While we do not yet have a confirmed estimate of when power will be restored, the provider has restored some building systems and is continuing to restore power to the rest of the facility.

Our datacenter partner has informed us of a complete power loss in our London location. We are in communication with them at this time, and will provide additional updates as soon as they're available.
We are currently experiencing a complete outage in our London location. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to restore connectivity as quickly as possible.
We are currently experiencing a partial outage in our London location. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to restore connectivity as quickly as possible.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Amsterdam location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2022-01-12 23:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-01-13 05:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Amsterdam instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
